name: Interstellar Clicker
description:
This is a small game I made for the Clicker Winter Jam 2023, and although there was a 10-day timeframe, between school and other activities I only had around 3-4 days to work on it. This is my first game jam and the first game I've ever published so I would appreciate honest feedback.

Overall I'm happy with what I finished, but I wish I could've had some extra time for things like better menus, more animations, and overall just other small details
